Jake Joseph joined the lab as a PhD student from the [Biomedical Engineering department](https://bme.umich.edu/academics/graduate/). Welcome, Jake!

He received a [Rackham Merit Fellowship](https://rackham.umich.edu/funding/rackham-merit-fellowship-program/) and was awarded a spot in the [Biomedical Informatics and Data Science Training Program (BIDS-TP)](https://bids-tp.umich.edu/home) T32 fellowship. Congrats!
